room_title: Escape room "The Hospital" by PuzzleWorks in Minneapolis - St. Paul
room_address: 550 Vandalia St. Suite 311 Saint Paul, MN 55114
room_description: Your best friend, the world's leading heart transplant surgeon, fell ill yesterday. In his hurry to leave the O.R., he mistakenly grabbed a heart cooler instead of his lunch box. Now, he's asked you to sneak into the hospital and return the heart before the next surgery. Can you switch the coolers before anyone notices?
